description: Returns metadata about the images in a repository.

parameters.name: repositoryName
parameters.description: The repository that contains the images to describe.

parameters.name: imageIds
parameters.description: The list of image IDs for the requested repository. (dict) --- An object with identifying information for an image in an Amazon ECR repository. imageDigest (string) --- The sha256 digest of the image manifest. imageTag (string) --- The tag used for the image.

nested_params.name: imageDigest
nested_params.description: The sha256 digest of the image manifest.

nested_params.name: imageTag
nested_params.description: The tag used for the image.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The filter key and value with which to filter your DescribeImages results. tagStatus (string) --- The tag status with which to filter your  DescribeImages results. You can filter results based on whether they are TAGGED or UNTAGGED.

nested_params.name: tagStatus
nested_params.description: The tag status with which to filter your  DescribeImages results. You can filter results based on whether they are TAGGED or UNTAGGED.

nested_items.name: imageDetails
nested_items.description: A list of  ImageDetail objects that contain data about the image.

nested_items.name: registryId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID associated with the registry to which this image belongs.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the repository to which this image belongs.

nested_items.name: imageDigest
nested_items.description: The sha256 digest of the image manifest.

nested_items.name: imageTags
nested_items.description: The list of tags associated with this image.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: imageSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: The size, in bytes, of the image in the repository.

nested_items.name: imagePushedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time, expressed in standard JavaScript date format, at which the current image was pushed to the repository.

nested_items.name: imageScanStatus
nested_items.description: The current state of the scan.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current state of an image scan.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the image scan status.

nested_items.name: imageScanFindingsSummary
nested_items.description: A summary of the last completed image scan.

nested_items.name: imageScanCompletedAt
nested_items.description: The time of the last completed image scan.

nested_items.name: vulnerabilitySourceUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The time when the vulnerability data was last scanned.

nested_items.name: findingSeverityCounts
nested_items.description: The image vulnerability counts, sorted by severity.
(string) ---
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: imageManifestMediaType
nested_items.description: The media type of the image manifest.

nested_items.name: artifactMediaType
nested_items.description: The artifact media type of the image.

nested_items.name: lastRecordedPullTime
nested_items.description: The date and time, expressed in standard JavaScript date format, when Amazon ECR recorded the last image pull.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The nextToken value to include in a future DescribeImages request. When the results of a DescribeImages request exceed maxResults, this value can be used to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
